title: The Luparelli tapes: The true story of the Mafia hitman who contracted to kill both Joey Gallo and his own wife
description: This is the bloddcurdling story of the Gallo crime family told through the eyes of one of his soldiers; Joe Luparelli tells all-how he functioned as a hitman for various Dons, and how he took on the contract to whack Joey Gallo.
author: Paul S. Meskil
